comment.author: 15903402@N00
comment._content: So what's the story of pigs in Florida? Why don't you hear as much about wild pigs as you do in other places in the South? Is there a difference between wild pigs and wild boars? How do they fit into the ecosystems in areas where they do live?

comment.author: 47441959@N00
comment._content: This is an interesting picture--you hear a lot about the role of pigs in settlement-era forest degradation, but you don't often see it....
